document_data.caption: Map showing where Shining Creek joins the Goblintide.
document_data.name: Shining Creek
document_data.mainbody: The '''Shining Creek''' traveled through the center of the [[Lurkwood]]. It joined the [[Goblintide River]] before the resulting tributary met with the [[River Surbrin]].
document_data.Notable Locations: The [[Dungeon of Death]] was located near the creek's waters.
